channel.description: 1 TCP/IP basic Exam Topics: 1.0 Network Fundamentals 1.3 Compare physical interface and cabling types 1.3a Single-mode fiber, multimode fiber, copper 1.3b Connections (Ethernet shared media and point-to-point) TCP/IP Model -ApplicationTransport -NetworkData Link Physical Application Layer services for applications http provides interface between software and the network ○ HTTP Header GET home.html ○ HTTP Header OK/ Data HTTP overview Same layer interaction on different computers Communicate with the same layer on another computer.
